#summary cron.

= Introduction =

Call your scripts at regular intervals to upload data. 


= Details =

cron is a Linux process that is used to perform tasks at regular intervals. The following statement will cause the script /usr/bin/wunderground.sh to be called every 15 minutes: 

`*/15 * * * * /usr/bin/wunderground.sh`

Enter the following command to add the line above to cron on your Linux system:

crontab -e
